name: Artifact of Skadi
author: Boekie
description: This old artifact that belongs to the godess of winter slows all creeps that come close.

name: Claws of Attack
author: Boekie
description: Increases attackdamage

name: Vulshok's Claws
author: Boekie
description: This weapon belongs to Vulshok, the ultimate warrior.

name: Dragon's Heart
author: Boekie
description: This heart of an ancient dragon increases crit chance and damage.

name: Archer's Hood
author: Boekie
description: This archer equipment boosts agility and speed but decreases pure damage.

name: Wizard Staff
author: Boekie
description: This magical staff increases the mana capacity of the tower.

name: Heavy Gun
author: Boekie
description: This heavy gun is slow to use but it packs an enormous punch.

name: Enchanted Mining Pick
author: Boekie
description: This mining pick is excellent at finding items but it's not a very good combat weapon.

name: Backpack
author: Boekie
description: Sometimes a useful item is found in this backpack.

name: Cursed Claw
author: Boekie
description: This cursed artifact slows attacked creeps.

name: Land Mine
author: Boekie
description: This brutal weapon increases damage but is not very effective against air units.

name: Magical Essence
author: Boekie
description: This essence is used by the nightelfs to increase their mana.

name: Stasis Trap
author: Boekie
description: This trap is used by the orcs to stun their enemies. It's not very reliable though.

name: Fist of Doom
author: Boekie
description: This item grants the user enormous demonic powers but at a great cost.

name: Outworn Spell Book
author: Boekie
description: A lot of ancient spells were explained in this book but almost everything is gone now.

name: Ninja Glaive
author: Boekie
description: An item used by ninjas to silently kill enemies.

name: Cruel Torch
author: Boekie
description: This serpentine staff ignites a burning rage within all who bear its glow.

name: Enchanted Knives
author: Boekie
description: These knives were used by a famous nightelf ranger. They can attack multiple units at once.

name: Survival Kit
author: Boekie
description: This kit contains everything you need to survive in the wilderness.

name: Combat Gloves
author: Boekie
description: These gloves are used by the most famous human warriors.

name: Orc War Spear
author: Boekie
description: This spear is used by barbaric orc warriors.

name: Divine Shield
author: Boekie
description: This divine shield protects the user from hazardous spells.

name: Love Potion
author: Boekie
description: This potion was made by a witch, it enhances the magic powers of the user.

name: Moonsilver Circlet
author: Majildian
description: This circlet has a powerful magic focusing gem in it.

name: Crystal Staff
author: Neotopia
description: The Crystal Staff of an old wizard. Commonly used to bash undead.

name: Lightning Boots
author: Boekie
description: These boots make you super fast, maybe even too fast.

name: Claws of the Bear
author: drol
description: These claws contain not only the strength of the bear, but also its wisdom.

name: Ceremonial Skull
author: Boekie
description: This skull was used in a necromantic ceremony.

name: Scroll of Myths
author: Boekie
description: This mythical item is created by a nightelf wizard.

name: Tome of Shadow Magic
author: drol
description: The pages look faded, still some power remains living inside the tome.

name: Zombie Hand
author: Majildian
description: A decaying hand that glows with necromantic power.

name: Phoenix Egg
author: drol
description: Still burning hot!

name: Bomb Shells
author: Neotopia
description: Simple Bomb Shells. Particulary effective against clusters of enemies.

name: Hand of Ruin
author: drol
description: Once the hand of an evil and powerful wizard, this hand only has a fraction of the power it once could cast.

name: Bonk's Face
author: drol
description: So heavy it is nearly impossible to move this giant rock.

name: Magic Branch
author: Boekie
description: This tree branch was cut from a magic tree.

name: Mini Sheep
author: Boekie
description: This sheep is hexed by a wizard, it's so small that you can put it in your pocket.

name: Pirate Map
author: Boekie
description: This map has an x on it, maybe a treasure is located there?

name: Piece of Meat
author: Boekie
description: This giant piece of meat is the favorite of very hungry warriors.

name: Gargoyle Wing
author: Boekie
description: This piece of wing belonged to a gargoyle statue.

name: Ancient Figurine
author: drol
description: This figurine was found in the ruins of a city located in the jungle.

name: Sleeve of Rage
author: SirCoqaLot.
description: Magical powers slumber in this ring.

name: Wine of Aluqah
author: SymphonyX
description: Drink the Wine of Aluqah and breathe the secret smoke of God.

name: Mask of Sanity
author: SymphonyX
description: This mask alters the wearers sanity in different ways.

name: Excalibur
author: SymphonyX
description: The legendary Sword of the Kings.

name: Minds Key
author: Neotopia
description: Opens the Gates to ones mind, making it sharper and clearer.

name: Mana Shell
author: drol
description: This shell once was a home of a magic creature.

name: Lucky Dice
author: Majildian
description: A bag of enchanted dice that increase the tower's chances.

name: Scepter of the Lunar Light
author: drol
description: Faintly glows in the dark.

name: Magic Hammer
author: F12ight
description: The magical hammer radiates power.

name: Battle Suit
author: Boekie
description: This battle suit improves combat skills. It becomes stronger when the user becomes stronger.

name: Zombie Head
author: Boekie
description: This evil zombie head gives the user enormous powers but it decreases the user's sight.

name: Mur'gul Slave
author: Boekie
description: This tiny Mur'gul helps you in combat.

name: Tiny Rabbit
author: Boekie
description: This fluffy rabbit can cheer up even a tower.

name: Flaming Arrow
author: Boekie
description: This flaming arrow boosts the user's damage.

name: Bhaal's Essence
author: poussix
description: The essence of The Lord of Murder.

name: Electrified Horseshoe
author: Neotopia
description: This metal Horseshoe sparkles and glimmers with power.

name: Warsong Double Bass
author: Neotopia
description: Commonly used for Elite Tauren Bands, the Bass drum increases attackspeed of nearby Towers.

name: Silver Armor
author: Boekie
description: This shiny armor is made of silver.

name: Flag of the Alliance
author: Boekie
description: This flag inspires the fighters of the alliance, they will attack faster.

name: Golden Decoration
author: Boekie
description: This decoration is so expensive that it is only used by kings.

name: Jewels of the Moon
author: drol
description: Once granted by the Moon to her servants, these jewels help whoever uses them for a good purpose.

name: Magic Vial
author: boekie
description: This vial contains a magic potion that enhances other spells.

name: Small Stone
author: cedi
description: Don't throw stones! A more experienced thrower can deal huge damage with it.

name: Fairy's Wand
author: cedi
description: Huh, it glowes. Maybe because of the batteries I put in.

name: Fancy Lights
author: cedi
description: Could that be fairy dust?

name: Floating Mark
author: cedi
description: The mark shows you where you really damage the enemy.

name: Blunt Club
author: drol
description: Not a very effective weapon.

name: Ledger
author: drol
description: Its pages mostly contain faded words.

name: Collection of Stories
author: drol
description: Some can teach you more than others.

name: Old Spear
author: drol
description: Has had its best time.

name: Primitive Flute
author: drol
description: Though primitive, this flute contains some magic.

name: Wooden Leg
author: drol
description: Worthless if you still have two legs.

name: Axe of Decapitation
author: cedi
description: Invented by humans to kill humans.

name: Void Vial
author: cedi
description: In this vial isn't even a spark of magic. That is really fearful for all magic creatures and caster.

name: Claws of Ursus
author: drol
description: These claws are said to be of Ursus himself, still containing a part of his power.

name: Claws of Wisdom
author: drol
description: Enables the wielder to carry out mystic rituals, but is impractical in combat.

name: Inscribed Bark
author: drol
description: Some words are vaguely written on this piece of bark.

name: Rusted Rifle
author: drol
description: Not a very reliable weapon.

name: Short Sword
author: Boekie
description: Increases the tower ' s attack damage.

name: Pillage Tools
author: drol
description: Good for looting, but impractical for combat.

name: Touch of a Spirit
author: drol
description: Empowers the reciever with regenerative strength.

name: Periscope
author: drol
description: Extends the view of the tower, making it hit the target precisely.

name: Ancient Inscribed Bark
author: drol
description: Increases the tower's damage against magical.

name: Blessed Holy Scepter
author: drol
description: Increases the tower's damage against undead.

name: Blunderbuss Rifle
author: drol
description: Increases the tower's damage against human creeps.

name: Thick Tree Branch
author: drol
description: Increases the tower's damage against orcs.

name: Undead Spiked Claws
author: drol
description: Increases the tower's damage against nature.

name: Dull Axe
author: Majildian
description: An axe that would have a hard time chopping down trees.

name: Hunting Map
author: drol
description: Has some rough sketches of the distant land on it.

name: Shimmerweed
author: drol
description: Orcs fear this magical weed.

name: Inscribed Pebble
author: drol
description: The inscription of the pebble seems to radiate some magic.

name: Gift of the Wild
author: drol
description: Bolsters the reciever with resistance against the dangers of nature.

name: Mining Lamp
author: drol
description: Makes valueable ores glitter in the dark.

name: Voodoo Doll
author: drol
description: Takes more and more control over its carrier.

name: Spiked Club
author: drol
description: Sharp and spiked.

name: Mini Tank
author: cedi
description: Back off, I've a canon in my pocket.

name: Faded Gloves
author: Majildian
description: A set of old gloves that have lost most of their power.

name: Rusty Mining Pick
author: Boekie
description: This mining pick helps with digging for items but it's not shiny anymore.

name: Arcane Eye
author: cedi
description: See ya and I know where it hurts.

name: Thunder Gloves
author: cedi
description: Shocking, right?

name: Polarisator
author: cedi
description: Uh, this thing is able to make things magnetic.

name: Priest Figurine
author: Boekie
description: This small figurine shines bright on damaged creeps. They will grant more experience.

name: Old Crystal Ball
author: Majildian
description: This item allows the wielder to see items others cannot.

name: Spiderling
author: Boekie
description: A small but poisonous critter.

name: Spider Silk
author: Neotopia
description: Can be thrown on flying enemies to deal additional damage.

name: Troll Voodoo Mask
author: Neotopia
description: Still contains the magic of the medicine man who once carried this mask.

name: Expanding Mind
author: drol
description: The more you know, the more you realize that you know nothing.

name: Magic Flower
author: drol
description: Magicly enchanted, making the flower grow very fast.

name: Mark of the Talon
author: drol
description: Boost the body with agility and the mind with wisdom.

name: Mark of the Claw
author: drol
description: Boost the body with strength and the mind with wisdom.

name: Flawless Sapphire
author: drol
description: The gem looks flawless, so pretty. It makes the carrier want more of these.

name: Small Orb
author: Majildian
description: A tiny dim orb.

name: Support Column
author: drol
description: Used by miners to create tunnels to the treasures hidden deep.

name: Obsidian Figurine
author: drol
description: As black as the night, this statue works as a ward for evil powers inflicted on the carrier.

name: Shadowfoot's Mantle
author: drol
description: Only used by those who know how to get the best items.

name: Blood Crown
author: drol
description: The gems set on this crown look like they're made of blood.

name: Sobi Mask
author: drol
description: Commonly used in theatres, but sometimes also used in combat to intimidate the enemy.

name: Knowing Mind
author: drol
description: Grants the reciever the ability to excel in its strengths.

name: Purifying Gloves
author: drol
description: Mends every wound, hurts every villain.

name: Basic Wand
author: Majildian
description: A wand for beginner magicians.

name: Medallion of Opulence
author: Chronos
description: This medallion allows its wearer to imbue his strikes with gold.

name: Troll Charm
author: SirCoqaLot.
description: It's a rotten hand

name: Scroll of Piercing Magic
author: drol
description: An ancient scroll which learns the reader how to destroy even the most fortified magic protections.

name: Mystical Shell
author: drol
description: You can hear the entire ocean when holding it next to your ear.

name: Forcefield Generator
author: drol
description: Negates all offensive magic in an area.

name: Crescent Stone
author: drol
description: The runes inscribed on this stone light up at full moon.

name: Dumpster
author: Monolith
description: You can find a lot of useless stuff inside a Dumpster.

name: Plain Staff
author: Majildian
description: A basic staff that amplifies spells channeled through it.

name: Hippogryph Egg
author: drol
description: Spawns a hippogryph who fights for the carrier.

name: Mana Stone
author: F12ight
description: The stone radiates with energy.

name: Dagger of Bane
author: F12ight
description: The dagger oozes out deadly green poison.

name: The Sucona
author: cedi
description: Superior Undead Claws of Nature Annihilation. Yay.

name: Beast Head
author: cedi
description: Only the bravest and strongest warriors are able to kill such a beast without hurting the head.

name: Training Manual
author: Majildian
description: A book about the basics of combat.

name: Grand Seal of Pickiness
author: Glowackos
description: Worn only by the wealthiest of landlords.

name: Pendant of Promptness
author: Glowackos
description: Tears at the very fabrics of time to imbue its bearer with immense speed.

name: Bartuc's Spirit
author: Bartuck
description: Enhances the carrier with the spirit of Bartuc, an ancient demonic warrior. Occasionally releases a burst of magic upon attacking.

name: Diamond of Greed
author: Majildian
description: It's said that whoever holds this gem shall be incredibly wealthy, but will always want more.

name: Chrono Jumper
author: axllow
description: Space-teleport device. Use it carefully.

name: Magician's Doorkey
author: Majildian
description: A key to a magical house on a magical hilltop given to magicians after they complete their training. It is prone to rust.

name: Jah'Rakal's Fury
author: Der_kleine_Tomy
description: The essence of Jah'rakal.

name: Blunt Dagger
author: Majildian
description: A dagger better suited to bashing than stabbing.

name: Wanted List
author: Lapsus
description: Helps the carrier make extra coin from kills.

name: Shiny Emerald
author: poussix
description: Helps the carrier concentrate.

name: Toy Boy
author: cedi
description: Play with me, or I will kill you.

name: Dull Gem
author: Majildian
description: A gem that makes the carrier hunger for more wealth.

name: Naga Trident
author: poussix
description: Naga empower the steel of their tridents, rendering them stainless.

name: Jungle Stalker's Doll
author: poussix
description: This doll is empowered with voodoo spells, be careful!

name: Panda Dress
author: poussix
description: Makes you feel incredibly powerful.

name: Wise Man's Cooking Recipe
author: SternBogen
description: Teaches its carrier how to prepare and eat the brains of its victims.

name: Writer's Knowledge
author: poussix
description: Sometimes words are stronger than weapons.

name: Ring of Luck
author: Majildian
description: Wearing this ring increases luck.

name: Elite Sharp Shooter
author: SternBogen
description: Take your time to make a deadly Elite Sharp Shot!

name: Holy Axe
author: Boekie
description: Increases the tower ' s damage against undead.

name: Sign of Energy Infusion
author: cedi
description: This sign is able to infuse attacks with regeneration.

name: Enchanted Bird Figurine
author: drol
description: Once the property of witches and shamans, this figurine now unveils its secrets to you.

name: Mining Tools
author: drol
description: The basic equipment every miner needs to do his job.

name: Charged Disk
author: drol
description: The disk emits a blueish light.

name: Young Thief's Cloak
author: Majildian
description: This cloak imparts the knowledge of a young thief to the wearer.

name: Commander
author: SternBogen
description: Get ready to attack ...

name: Glaive of Surpreme Follow Up
author: cedi
description: Never ever be frustrated again because there is just no follow up damage.

name: Skull Trophy
author: drol
description: Gained upon victory over an enemy.

name: Tooth Trophy
author: drol
description: Serving as proof of merit, this item displays the courage of the owner.

name: Basics of Calculus
author: drol
description: Contains all information you need to perfect your attack, in a very abstract way.

name: Wand of Mana Zap
author: drol
description: Then there was like this massive purple zap, and all my mana was gone!' - a creep

name: Never-ending Keg
author: cedi
description: Woot, you feel already drunk because you touched the keg?

name: Scarab Amulet
author: drol
description: Energizes the spirit of the carrier.

name: Tree Branch
author: Boekie
description: Increases the tower's damage against orcs.

name: Crystalized Scales
author: drol
description: These scales seem to be crystalized by an unknown process.

name: Eternium Blade
author: Majildian
description: A blade forged from the strongest metal, capable of cutting through anything.

name: Sacred Halo
author: drol
description: Surrounds the head of the carrier with a ring of light.

name: Railgun
author: drol
description: Hits from this gun can be quite a punch.

name: Essence of Rot
author: Majildian
description: An undefinable object that leaches the livelihood of any nearby creature.

name: Toxic Chemicals
author: Majildian
description: A deadly waste product, very effective at destroying natural beings.

name: Runed Wood
author: drol
description: Controlling the magic inside this piece of wood will grant the carrier immense power.

name: Undead Claws
author: Boekie
description: Increases the tower ' s damage against nature.

name: Dark Matter Trident
author: cedi
description: Made from a mysterious material.

name: Ritual Talisman
author: drol
description: Used in mystical shamanistic rituals.

name: Libram of Grace
author: drol
description: Carrying this around makes you at ease, gaining more experience from combat.

name: Bloodthirsty Wheel of Fortune
author: Palandu
description: This wheel can only be spun when oiled with a victim's blood.

name: Spider Broach
author: drol
description: This jewellery looks beautiful, the eyes of the spider are made from tiny emeralds.

name: Mighty Tree's Acorns
author: poussix
description: Acorns need to be shared

name: Soul Collectors Cloak
author: cedi
description: This cloak has the special ability to absorb the souls of units that are killed by the user of the cloak.

name: Sniper
author: Boekie
description: Increases the tower's damage against bosses.

name: Liquid Gold
author: drol
description: Boosts damage with a drawback.

name: Ogre Staff of Wisdom
author: Palandu
description: Me Bash You !

name: Staff of the Wild Equus
author: drol
description: While wielding this staff a vast power becomes part of you.

name: Heavy Crossbow
author: drol
description: Bolts of this crossbow deliver quite a punch to your enemies.

name: Demonic Orb
author: Majildian
description: A demon trapped within an orb so that it's power may be tapped.

name: Speed Demon's Reward
author: Palandu
description: Rewards the player with gold and exp for fighting non-stop

name: Deep Shadows
author: cedi
description: Used to increase the damage against sol armor.

name: Staff of Essence
author: cedi
description: 100%, not a bit more.

name: Bones of Essence
author: cedi
description: Used to increase the damage against sif armor.

name: Aqueous Vapor
author: cedi
description: Used to increase the damage against myt armor.

name: Glowing Gauntlets
author: Majildian
description: These gauntlets produce a purple glow that increases the speed of the wearer.

name: Magnetic Field
author: DaveMatthews
description: Increases buff duration and reduces debuff duration of nearby towers.

name: Frog Pipe
author: Deemzul
description: A pipe with a sound that frogs cannot resist.

name: Dowsing Rod
author: YouJizzTD
description: A device used to search for items by tapping into the land's magnetic fields.

name: Spellbook of Item Mastery
author: Majildian
description: This spellbook contains a variety of spells for items.

name: Even More Magical Hammer
author: cedi
description: The professional version.

name: Optimist's Preserved Face
author: cedi
description: The thing above my fireplace? Ye, that was my first optimist.

name: Sword of Reckoning
author: drol
description: Increases the damage nearby towers deal to undead creeps.

name: Sparkling Staff
author: Majildian
description: This staff contains so much magical power that the air around it sparkles.

name: Sword of Decay
author: drol
description: Increases the damage nearby towers deal to nature creeps.

name: Mindleecher
author: Majildian
description: A powerful item normally used to transfer knowledge from old wizards to young ones, this one has been corrupted so that it works on anything.

name: M.E.F.I.S. Rocket
author: cedi
description: Now, If only I could remember where I put the manual.

name: Orb of Souls
author: Sunken
description: Inside the orb you can see the swirling, tormented souls of countless victims.

name: Bloodthirsty Axe
author: Majildian
description: This axe glows with its thirst for blood.

name: Shining Rock
author: Deemzul
description: With this rock, you can shine like Danny.

name: Lich Mask
author: cedi
description: They make great party favor! Although they do melt your face off.

name: Brimstone Helmet
author: cedi
description: Never ask an abstinent dwarfen smith for a custom-fitted helmet.

name: Overcharge Shot
author: cedi
description: Spells: collateral damage.

name: Pendant of Mana Supremacy
author: cedi
description: Even if this item isn't really valuable it is still very rare.

name: Share Knowledge
author: SternBogen
description: Share your knowledge with others!

name: Blaster Staff
author: cedi
description: A gift from the owner of a castle.

name: Enchanted Telescope
author: Majildian
description: This telescope allows you to spot things that would normally be missed, at any distance.

name: Nermind's Eye
author: cedi
description: The all seeing eye of Nermind.

name: Eye of True Sight
author: cedi
description: This eye is a magical artefact created to hunt and kill invisible creatures.

name: Book of Knowledge
author: Boekie
description: Grants the tower bonus experience.

name: Iron Leg
author: drol
description: More reliable leg, but still worthless if you have two legs.

name: Master Thief's Shroud
author: Majildian
description: This item lets the wearer see through a master thief's eyes, helping them to find the best items.

name: Fiery Assassination Arrow
author: drol
description: A deadly combusting arrow designed to hunt down larger beings.

name: Unstable Current
author: Finger of Destiny
description: Used to increase the damage against hel armor.

name: Lunar Essence
author: Finger of Destiny
description: A powerful knowledge is captured into this essence.

name: Bloody Key
author: Finger of Destiny
description: It echoes grand wars of the past.

name: Razor Sharp Dagger
author: Majildian
description: This dagger goes through flesh as if it was paper.

name: The Divine Wings of Tragedy
author: SymphonyX, Finger of Destiny
description: These wings once belonged to an angel.

name: Currency Converter
author: Finger of Destiny
description: Converts your experience into gold.

name: Ring of Chance
author: Majildian
description: This ring manipulates the laws of chance in the wearers favor.

name: Strange Item
author: Deemzul
description: This item has a strange smell.

name: Elegant Ring
author: ShyGnome
description: Beautifully crafted and encrusted with pretty jewels.

name: Hermit Staff
author: ShyGnome
description: A basic staff that strengthens the presence of supportive spells.

name: Veteran's Tome of Battle
author: Majildian
description: A tome that took a lifetime to write and contains many basic and advanced combat techniques.

name: Enchanted Gear
author: Boekie
description: An old, enchanted gear that increases speed and trigger chances.

name: Secret Tome of Magic
author: hokkei
description: This magical tome greatly magnifies the strength of one's spells, at the expense of the loss of accuracy.

name: Secret Tome of Mana
author: hokkei
description: This magical tome greatly increase one's capacity for mana, even if it quickly drains it.

name: Mini Furbolg
author: cedi
description: Every kid wants one.

name: Holy Hand Grenade
author: cedi
description: Remember worms?

name: Old Hunter
author: Guennter
description: "I will teach you, what hunting is like!"

name: Monocle
author: Guennter
description: Slow down and concentrate on searching items.

name: Arms Dealer
author: limfa
description: He can get rid of your illegal arms.

name: Circle of Power
author: Deemzul
description: Power! Unlimited power!

name: Haunted Hand
author: Sunken
description: A haunted hand with a mind of it's own, it attacks with reckless fervor.

name: Chameleons Soul
author: Boekie
description: This soul adapts itself to its user.

name: Golden Trident
author: Boekie
description: Whenever this magical trident makes a devastating hit it creates some gold.

name: Crit Blade
author: Ranakastrasz
description: This blade improves chance of critical strikes.

name: Arcane Script
author: Finger of Destiny
description: Oooh! What are these ancient scribings?

name: Soul Collector's Scythe
author: hokkei
description: This scythe absorbs the souls of units slain by its wielder.

name: Doom's Ensign
author: cedi
description: This relic is imbued with dark powers.

name: Distorted Idol
author: Deemzul
description: Exists beyond reality.

name: Ball Lightning
author: axllow
description: It's a hot potato.

name: Dragon Claws
author: Boekie
description: Increases the tower's crit chance and attack damage.

name: Shrapnel Ammunition
author: cedi
description: Used to increase the damage against lua armor.

name: Spear of the Malphai
author: Khlox-NL-
description: This spear is known for its ability to strike an enemy repeatedly in a weak spot.

name: Quicktrigger Blade
author: Velex
description: Can be drawn in a second, but doesn't carry much of a punch.

name: Crystalline Arrow
author: Boekie
description: An arrow made of crystal. It is not very strong but it always hits a weak spot.

name: Vampiric Skull
author: Boekie
description: A skull that absorbs magic forces.

name: Granite Hammer
author: Boekie
description: This hammer is heavy, but when it hits it's devastating.

name: Ogre Battle Axe
author: Boekie
description: Makes the tower a real threat to humankind.

name: Spear of Loki
author: Boekie
description: This spear of an old northern god is a very tricky weapon. It has enormous powers but also has a drawback.

name: Magic Link
author: MasterCassim
description: This item can be used to transfer experience to other towers.

name: Elunes Bow
author: cedi
description: The goddess gave this to the mighty priestess named Tirande with the order: Crush the enemies!""

name: Elunes Quiver
author: cedi
description: This quiver can't run out of arrows as long as the wearer lives.

name: Soul Extractor
author: Boekie
description: This item extracts souls from dead enemies and uses them to stun enemies.

name: Stunner
author: Boekie
description: An advanced machine used to stun enemies.

name: El Bastardo
author: cedi
description: The legendary El Bastardo! ( w00t wc3 and Gothic 3 ? )

name: Magic Gloves
author: Boekie
description: These magic gloves add minor magic powers to each attack.

name: Portable Tombstone
author: Boekie
description: A dark artefact from a graveyard seldom spoken of.

name: Workbench
author: Boekie
description: This bench is used to improve other items.

name: Phase Gloves
author: Boekie
description: The carrier of this item deals a small amount of its attack damage as spelldamage.

name: Assassination Arrow
author: drol
description: A deadly arrow specialy crafted for assassination.

name: Amulet of Strength
author: LordHellHunter
description: Increases damage and crit-chance of the tower.

name: Magic Conductor
author: Boekie
description: This item is able to transform magic powers into a speed bonus.

name: Unyielding Maul
author: drol
description: Being unbendable this weapon can give the wielder an advantage or a disadvantage.

name: Faithful Staff
author: Boekie
description: Grants experience when a spell is cast on a friendly tower.

name: Lucky Gem
author: Boekie
description: This gem gives the tower random effects.

name: Shackles of Time
author: drol
description: These shackles manipulate time, giving the wielder a better chance at using his powers.

name: Chameleon Glaive
author: Boekie
description: This glaive is able to mimic every kind of weapon.

name: Helm of Insanity
author: Boekie
description: Gives enormous strength but exhausts the user.

name: Book of Force
author: gEx
description: Grants 3 Force Points when used.

name: Consumable Plant
author: gEx
description: Grants 1 food when used.

name: Consumable Chicken
author: gEx
description: Grants 2 food when used.

name: Mine Cart
author: gEx
description: Increases your income by 10% when used.

name: Consumable Piggy
author: gEx
description: Grants 5 food when used.

name: Arcane Book of Power
author: gEx
description: Grants 8 force points when used.

name: Divine Book of Omnipotence
author: gEx
description: Grants 15 force points when used.
